website_summaries.verdict: The Griffin Video Display Converter provides an easy way to get HDMI and DVI video from an Apple laptop.
pros: includes DVI-out connector as well as HDMI
outputs audio with new MacBook Pros
cons: The price is a little steep: $40 is a lot to pay for a dongle

customer_reviews.title: Plugs in so loosely it's unreliable, didn't work, cheaper one worked fine.
customer_reviews.text: The mini-displayport connector plugged into the mini-displayport jack on my Macbook so loosely it could fall out under its own weight. As it wiggled around -- or even if left alone -- it didn't make a reliable connection. It was easy to see by the Macbook repeatedly detecting this adapter and changing its display that the connection was coming and going. Even when connected, this adapter didn't work with the HDTV I tried it with. I swapped it out for a friend's Belkin branded (and much cheaper) adapter and that worked great. Maybe it only works at some resolutions? Definitely a 1-star product -- it fails to do even the most basic job that it's for.
customer_reviews.author: A discerning consumer

customer_reviews.title: Enables HDMI audio on a 2010 MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: The reason for this purchase was to route audio from a MacBook Pro to an HDTV. I had previously bought a $7.52 Mini DisplayPort to HDMI adapter. Although the Mac saw the TV, the TV was silent. Under "Comments" for the other adapter, a poster said it was a Mac setting under sound properties that enabled the audio. After doing a little troubleshooting, I decided it wasn't the MacBook that was the problem, but the adapter instead. After reading some of the customer reviews here, I decided that the Griffin was the solution. After plugging in this adapter, my TV had sound. 5 stars for functionality and a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Converter - The best out there!
customer_reviews.text: I got it two days after I ordered it hesitant because of other reviews about problems with the 10.6 OS. Well, I have to tell you that it works PERFECT. I have a 15-inch Macbook Pro Mid 2010 with OS 10.6.6 and it works like a charm. I even tested the HDMI with my Sony 46 LCD and it worked right away. So the great news is the it DOES WORK! and it is cheaper than the apple brand one that only gives you DV connectivity. With this adapter you get DV and HDMI for a lower price. Do not search any more, there is no better deal out there.
customer_reviews.author: jkalonso

customer_reviews.title: works like it should
customer_reviews.text: Using this with a Macbook Pro late 2011. For some reason the other mini display port to HDMI cable stopped working correctly. It would send the video, but there were always issues with the audio going through the HDMI so I'd have to use a separate cable for the sound which totally defeats the purpose. This cable works without a hitch. Plus the added DVI adapter makes it a little more versatile if you want to hook it up to a computer monitor that doesn't have an HDMI input.
customer_reviews.author: An Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Was a 5 star. Not anymore
customer_reviews.text: I really had no problems with this device and found it to be pretty capable until about 4-5 months of use. My picture and sound would glitch and I thought the HDMI cable was to blame. Replaced the cable 2x and still the same glitching error. Replaced the GC17096 with theand it works flawlessly. I would recommend the J-Tech over this for sure.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Marki

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality, super durable and handy with the DVI-I ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality, super durable and handy with the DVI-I adapter. i've been using it for more than 3 years and still working like day 1. i'm a mobile vj and this is definitely a most accessory you'll want to have on your vj bag.
customer_reviews.author: William R.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: The device worked perfect for about 6 months. I have a mid 2010 MB Pro. The device supports audio. After a while the video will cut out intermittently because of a bad connection. I will say that the device doesn't fit snuggly on the hdmi side but fits nicely on the Mini DP side. My problem was likely to with the fact that I unplug and travel a lot. My guess is, if the solution is meant to be stationary it would last longer. It still works on some monitors better than others.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Cunha

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to connect my 2010 Macbook Pro to a Sony LCD TV. I use a 25 ft HDMI cable from the TV to the Griffin unit which then connects to the mini display port on my laptop. On the Mac you have to select System Preferences from the Apple menu and choose Sound, then select your TV as the sound output. We watch netflix streaming video and it works perfectly. Keep the plastic cap to cover the HDMI end of the adapter when it is not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Sound and video work with Spring 2010 Macbook Pro 13"!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my new Macbook Pro 13" Spring 2010 version. I can confirm that it does indeed transmit sound to my TV and the video output looks great. Only had to turn on the HDMI external sound in OSX preferences and choose my video output size in OSX display preferences. I can now watch Hulu on my TV from the comfort of my couch!! Looks like this product is well made and will last for years. It was much cheaper here than the Apple Store or Griffin Direct. Product #GC17096.
customer_reviews.author: another consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to Apple Branded Item
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this because it was so much cheaper compared to the Apple-branded version, but because of the savings I decided it was worth the risk to try it out. I have not been disappointed. We've been using this cable for years to connect my MacBook Pro to our TV and we've had nothing but good experiences. It's simple to use, works great and definitely seems to last.
customer_reviews.author: b.g.

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit securely.
customer_reviews.text: This item does not fit securely into the display port. It sits wiggly and easily causes the screen to black out. I have tried other after market brands as well and they all do the same. Unfortunately this might be an item where you have to buy the expensive Apple brand.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Tynan

customer_reviews.title: Great 2 in 1 - works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The HDMI sends video AND audio from my new MacBook Pro to my flat screen TV (don't forget to change the audio output setting on your computer!). DVI connection works great with my monitor. I like the fact that you have both options with one adapter. If you have a newer Mac and want audio through HDMI this will work, beware of other cheaper adapters that say they will do this as many have found out that's not the case. Glad I went with this one. Fast shipping, good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: fixed my "mac wont wake up with lid closed" problems
customer_reviews.text: For a long time I had been having problems getting my mac to wake up when the lid was closed and it was connected to a monitor+keyboard. Turns out I had a flaky/borderline/low-quality mini-DVI-to-HDMI adapter! This one fixed the problem immediately -- now it wakes up every time, on the first keystroke. Also nice that I can get audio through it!
customer_reviews.author: Jack Falk

customer_reviews.title: No Problems
customer_reviews.text: This cable works perfectly for me. I can use the HDMI from my macbook pro 8,2 to my HDTV and it allows audio+video through. Sometimes I have to click on system properties, sound, output, and then select the TV in the output box to have the audio go through the TV. The DVI also works great. Just a heads up, its a DVI-D just make sure that is what you have. I can hook this up to my external monitor for my desktop using the DVI connector to the HDMI. There remains a small gap when you attach the DVI converter to the cable but it is no issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: Vivek

customer_reviews.title: Audio output works on MBP 2010
customer_reviews.text: When I first plug it into my TV, the TV appears as an additional audio output device, once I switched the output from build-in speaker to the TV, Voila ... audio output from the TV! The build quality is very good, and the DVI adapter is an added bonus. The price is cheaper than the Apple DVI adapter, too. Definitely worth 5 stars. The only thing I can complaint about, may be, I wish it has a white color option.
customer_reviews.author: T. Yu

customer_reviews.title: Works great, design a little annoying
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for using with your Macbook Pro. I have the model from early 2010 when they started having the audio and video come out of the Mini DisplayPort and this product did the trick. I really love it and use it all of the time. I would say the one negative is that the piece is very rigid and doesn't allow you to bend it freely. After about a year and a half the base is finally bending because the plastic wore away, fortunately it still works fine! I would recommend if the rigid base doesn't bother you.
customer_reviews.author: Tom TB

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly with the 27" iMacs (late 2009)!
customer_reviews.text: The Griffin video adapter has arrived and I can confirm that the video and audio work perfectly with my 27 inch iMac and my LG 47 inch 1080p HDTV. You just have to remember to set your TV as the sound output source in the System Preferences. The audio does not cut out at all and it sounds great! Save yourself some money by getting this adapter from Amazon as it is much cheaper than buying it from the Apple Store. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: P. Natsch

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly until...
customer_reviews.text: ...my 2010 MacBook Pro fell off my couch (I have hardwood floors). Totally my fault (long story). And I was all set to finish watching "Orange is the New Black" too. I'll just have to settle for watching it on my laptop until my replacement adapter arrives. I just ordered another one and it should be here by tomorrow (fingers crossed). I'll be much more careful this time around!
customer_reviews.author: J. Redick

customer_reviews.title: April 2010 MacBook Pro i7
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the new i7 MacBook Pro from Apple a few days after it came out and have loved it! One thing that has frustrated me though is that the mini display port is supposed to have the ability to output video and sound to HDMI adapters. After purchasing two different adapters and spending a few hours researching the issues, I finally found this one! I received the device quickly, no issues with the purchase process, and it works flawlessly with all of my LCD TVs. Both audio and video come through the TV. Highly recommended if you have one of the new MacBook Pros that supports audio out via the mini display port!
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Solid solution for both desktop and mobile use
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets over a year ago. One, along with a USB cable, connects a 2011 13" Macbook Air to a; together they make a super dual monitor desktop with a 4-port USB hub at a fraction of the cost of an Apple Display. The pair of cables (mini displayport and USB) are plugged and unplugged at least daily and have never given me any problems. The 2nd adapter travels with me everywhere and has been used with both HDMI & DVI projectors, with both Macbook Airs & Pros, again with no problems. Conclusion: high quality, long lasting adapters in a convenient paired set.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pringle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I wish i never bought the cheaper adapter from here. It died after 4 uses, although the HDMI cable shipped was pretty decent. What can you expect for 12 bucks, anyway, this adapter is awesome. It is cheap and does HDMI and DVI. It also takes the digital audio from my 2010 macbook pro to the TV and Samsung Monitor via HDMI. Very pleased and this company is a good company anyway. Don't buy the cheap stuff and expect it to work forever.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work for MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: Works for Windows PC's but not for the MacBook Pro... Damn cords this is the second or third adapter I've tried, it seems like they've stopped selling most of the ones that worked with the MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.author: Pineapples

customer_reviews.title: Great adapter
customer_reviews.text: This adapter is awesome! I have had it for over a year and it is still in great condition. Having the removable DVI adapter is awesome and even though I don't use it for my macbook anymore I still use it for connecting other devices to my computer monitor from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Adapter
customer_reviews.text: These are the 2nd batch I've purchased. Unfortunately, they don't engage flush like the previous version; however, they do work great. No glitches when connecting my Early 2011 17" Macbook Pro to panels, projectors, switchers, and scalers.
customer_reviews.author: V. Dean

customer_reviews.title: best hdmi converter available for the macbook pro
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased 5 months ago and it's still going strong. I previously went through 2 converters from various sellers on amazon and they both broke within a month. I'm student and constantly plugging and unplugging my macbook to take it to class. This means a lot of stress on the converter, but Griffin has done a good job making a converter that will keep up with me. The included adapter is a plus. If you are looking for an affordable and well designed adapter, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: This one is capable of audio!
customer_reviews.text: This is the Griffin model that's selling for almost twice this much on Apple's website. It is capable of carrying audio over HDMI from my 13" Macbook Pro 2010 model. Seems like a strong converter. I have no fear of it bending and tearing over time. Everything looks and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Frank B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Picture, but NO AUDIO!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to display out to my 46" Samsung LED TV and picture was great, audio works if you do not use the DVI adapter. The DVI adapter can only display video. If you can do without the dvi piece and strait hdmi then it works beautifully!!! Pros: Excellent picture and sync rate. Cons: None
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Finicky and eventually stopped working
customer_reviews.text: This adapter was always super finicky. You can't leave it at the wrong angle or the display disconnects. It got harder and harder to use. Harder than getting my N64 to work after months of non-use (and that's hard). Finally, it just stopped working and I had to buy and another one. Lame.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good adapter
customer_reviews.text: This is basically an HDMI adapter for your MacBook. It's got good build quality, it fits, and the signal is perfect. It even comes with an HDMI to DVI adapter so you can output your MacBook video to either HDMI or DVI. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Wang

customer_reviews.title: amazing!
customer_reviews.text: ive had this for over a year. i lost it so i bought a different brand and that one broke in about a month and so i was about to order another one of these griffin adapters but the i found my old one! ans =d it still works GREAT to this day! i love it! great video and audio signals
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Doerfel

customer_reviews.title: Yes! I Have HDMI Audio for My 2010 MacBook Pro!
customer_reviews.text: I earlier bought this cheap, $5 mini displayport to HDMI adapter here on Amazon for my new MacBook Pro, and it didn't do audio when it clearly stated that it does. Well, this one actually does. It a bit expensive, but it's cheaper here than on Apple's site. And it's well made, too. It's thick and feel very rugged. It's definitely not going to fall apart. That $5 one felt and looked incredibly cheap. Plus, if you ever need it, you have that DVI adapter. An excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: CannonKnight

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as promised
customer_reviews.text: Needed this to connect Mac to HDMI TV connection. It works exactly as advertised. It's long enough that it doesn't leave a rigid set of connectors out the side of the laptop but not so long that it's a pain to keep with you in your bag.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Great while it worked
customer_reviews.text: Worked about 3 times. After that I would get static or the connection would not be detected. The product feels sturdy and I figured Griffin is a decent enough brand. I may have just gotten a faulty item. But I have seen other reviews stating the same issues.
customer_reviews.author: 3rd Time is a Charmer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy, but it works well with my MBP 2011 Unibody. It DOES transfer sound, but one must remember to change the 'audio out' settings in the System Preferences. I watch movies on my TV with it all the time now and video/audio quality are great!
customer_reviews.author: Ian D. Owens

customer_reviews.title: Good quality - looks built to last
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a different brand about a year ago. I had the same problem others reported. I have been using this one for about a month now, and it appears to be far better made. I expect it to last longer and perform better. The size is a bit smaller as well, which is an advantage to me. I paid a bit more for this one, but its worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Zman

customer_reviews.title: Title
customer_reviews.text: Overall it works great! Looks pretty good, except for the fact it is half a foot long, and feels great. The pricing is cheaper then the apple version of the product but still pretty expensive. If you need a dvi or hdmi to mini display, go with this and not the apple version. It's like a two for one deal, so much more worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mikeG

customer_reviews.title: works!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got my MacBook (white unibody 2010 7,1) to spit out AV over HDMI to a Tele. Product seems built well. Works as advertised! Oh. Dont forget to select HDMI audio output via System Pref to get your sound output correctly.
customer_reviews.author: K. W.

customer_reviews.title: Good product and a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Works okay. It didn't work at all at first but after a hardware update a few months later it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: J Howard

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Not cheaply made. Works on Mac book pro mini display port. You do need to select audio source in system preferences to get audio on the hdmi port. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: F.J.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered this the other day, and I can say it works well with my mid 2010 13" Macbook Pro to watch on my TV via an HDMI cable. The 1st time I used it there was some chop but I just updated the firmware for the video card through the apple software update and when I tried it after that it worked like a charm no chop at all. My only issue is the price it's a little more than I expected but something that works so well I'm happy I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: NDeG

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a traveler, this is all what you need to connect your MacBoox Air to one High Definition TV. The design is beautiful and is very small to bring with your lap. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this adapter which is the same offered as a solution from Apple. Although there are cheaper adapters out there, I didn't want to experement which one would work or not, especially with sound. When used on the later version of MBP 2010 which is all digital output, both video and sound are transfered to the hdmi with no loss of clarity.
customer_reviews.author: Achi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helped for using my tv as a second screen for my macbook
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very fast shipping... Excellent product. The product was expected. I have already several months using it on my Mac and it is not noticed or have not had any kind the problem
customer_reviews.author: Ramon De la cruz

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these units and they work well. One setup runs through ato a DVI KVM switch. The other setup runs direct to a Samsung LCD. Audio works great on the Samsung. I have a mid-2010 MBP.
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: Discontinued product but still outshines all.
customer_reviews.text: Works phenomenally. We owned a few other adapters but they either failed or worked intermittently. I bought this one on someone's recommendation and its been fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: spitfirejunky

customer_reviews.title: This product is really something
customer_reviews.text: Best piece of minidisplay port to hdmi solution although it cost your $20 more but the quality is way better than other brand I bought this for few month soo far soo good and it works on every apple laptop with mini display port
customer_reviews.author: Mark L.

customer_reviews.title: cheaper than at bestbuy
customer_reviews.text: Bough this product a while back and so far no problems. With no problems, I'm happy with this purchase because I saved money compared to buying it anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Konicek

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended. Stopped working after less than 10 uses.
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled when we got this. It worked brilliantly, but it's stopped working less than 6 weeks after purchase and less than 10 uses. There's no good explanation for such a short useful life. Now I'm left sorely disappointed and in search of a more reliable alternative.
customer_reviews.author: DCVAR

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This works out well. It is what it says it is, a nice converter. I actually don't use it a lot, but it's there, and it has served me well.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe Ruiz, S.J.

customer_reviews.title: Griffin Converter
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered the new mini-Mac computer, I also ordered this converter. When the computer arrived it came with a converter so I am in the process of returning this converter.
customer_reviews.author: Josey

customer_reviews.title: full 1080p+audio
customer_reviews.text: this exit allowed my MacBookPro to connect to my Sony Bravia TV through a full hd cable, of course! audio included (you may need to enable audio-hdmi on your thunderbolt)
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Posada

customer_reviews.title: Great for displaying your Mac on a large television or monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Solid build quality and design. Works flawlessly with my MacBook Pro. Apple's OS X Mavericks makes it super simple to use this adapter to add a second monitor to your Mac.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cutler

customer_reviews.title: Not quite plug and play
customer_reviews.text: While most Apple products are plug and play, sometimes they are not. The audio on my 60" plasma TV did not initially work after I connected it to my mid 2010 macbook pro using this HDMI adapter. But the issue was resolved by following "SlugBlanket's" instructions dated Sep 12, 2011 on the following discussion thread. Once it was resolved, the product worked great and the picture is superb. [...]
customer_reviews.author: J Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for connecting to HDTV
customer_reviews.text: It worked perfectly right out of the box. Now the TV I use for my monitor can also provide the sound and eliminate all the extra wiring and such required by a speaker system.
customer_reviews.author: KAAH in SC

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This product was unbelievable in a good way. Your knocking out two birds with one stone. You get both DVI and HDMI with one adapter. Instead of paying $60 with Apple your paying $30 for this one. On top of that, this one supports audio with HDMI with the 2011 Mac's unlike the Apple version. Getting full 1080p with my external Samsung monitor. I'm a very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jai M. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what i needed, and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I'd recommend this product to anyone; it's perfect for connecting my TV and box. I didn't need anything longer as I didn't want a lot of cables showing. This did the trick!
customer_reviews.author: E. Boulos

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly -
customer_reviews.text: - and seamlessly with my new MacBook Air. It is useful for work where I hook up to a monitor. Highly recommend to anyone who is looking!!!
customer_reviews.author: ls.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions, and got nothing. This product was recommended to me by apple to use with my Mac book pro and it doesn't work. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: K. Morrill

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Not much to this item. It does what it's supposed to well enough. Should work fine for anyone that needs it.
customer_reviews.author: Dakusan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Works well with my Macbook Pro. Just plugged it into the HDMI cable on TV and can watch movies from my computer displayed on TV. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Barbera

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I had the moshi adapter that Apple sells in their stores, but every 30 seconds or so the audio would cut out, sometimes the video would cut out for a second. Don't buy that piece of junk. Buy this one. Works great! I have perfect audio and video from my 27" iMac mini display port through this adapter and 15 feet of hdmi cable to my 42" phillips HDTV. Boxee media center running it all perfectly. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: NicholasCopernicus

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what was needed
customer_reviews.text: This device was exactly what my son needed for his Macintosh laptop and it's been working great. He's a satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.author: Einia

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what it was meant to do. Great video and audio from the Thunderbolt port on my MacBook Pro. Sturdy construction, shouldn't get bent or frayed anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn L. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Works fine-as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I'd recommend this product--works exactly as advertised and I've had no issues. If you need the adapter-this is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: cjc

customer_reviews.title: Best converter
customer_reviews.text: this converter is best, i have other cheap converters they have bad picture and sound quality. "Griffin Technology GC17096 Mini DisplayPort to HDMI or DVI Video Display Converter" have a grate quality, it is heavy and have grate finish look.
customer_reviews.author: Teimuraz

customer_reviews.title: Complete the arsenol...
customer_reviews.text: Wish griffin would do this for every conceivable cord. Not only is it attractive but it goes right with the 3 pack of USB stubs. Imaging is awesome and for the costs its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Chastity  Shannon

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: this product works absolutely great. i had issues getting the audio to work originally on my laptop until I found that you have to close the program and reopen it with the HDMI cable plugged in already to fix it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product for the past week and it is working great. I had a little trouble getting the display to work. But my solution was to adjust settings in the Display in System Preferences. I set the display to 1080p and then used underscan to fit the display.
customer_reviews.author: M. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: These adapters are fantastic! I wish Griffin hadn't discontinued them
customer_reviews.text: These adapters are fantastic! I wish Griffin hadn't discontinued them.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard B. Carman

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've used other mini displayport to HDMI converter, and this is the ONLY one I've found that will transfer both audio and video. The picture and audio quality is amazing, and the simplicity of a one cable hookup is very gratifying. I think the price is a bit steep, but then again, there's really no competition.
customer_reviews.author: Joey H

customer_reviews.title: Weak sauce
customer_reviews.text: Basically threw it away as soon as we got it.
customer_reviews.author: Dill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for computer to TV Viewing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in order to watch streaming shows on the television. Works very well and have had no issues with this.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa B.

customer_reviews.title: Great HDMI/DVI for Apple Thunderport
customer_reviews.text: Great, a quarter of the price then apple's connector and comes with the HDMI and DVI adaptor. Have been using it for about a year now without any problems. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: hesham

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought the MDP to HDMI adaptor from Moshi first. After spending an hour fiddling with it and not getting anywhere, I sent it back and bought this one. Refreshingly, it worked straight out of the box, no problems. Up and running after adjusting my monitor setting to "mirror" and selecting my audio output to be my TV. Terrific!
customer_reviews.author: K. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly with my MacBook Pro
customer_reviews.text: Worked the first time, flawlessly. The HDTV recognized that another device was plugged in and I was able to take it from there. Don't bother trying the cheaper adapters. All kinds of connectivity issues. Had to return those before I found the one that worked--the Griffin.
customer_reviews.author: Gus Can't Sing

customer_reviews.title: Great product -- Even better support
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product about 11 months ago. It worked great with my two macs with DisplayPort and passed through HDMI audio and video flawlessly. Unfortunately, it stopped functioning the other day, but one 5-minute phone call to Griffin got me another one shipped with no questions asked. Glad I spent the little extra money and got a name brand product; Griffin's phone support is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle R Symonds

customer_reviews.title: A great alternative!
customer_reviews.text: This works better than the apple adapter and also has the vga output! a must buy for people who like plugging in laptops to tvs.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan K

customer_reviews.title: Cheap version ????
customer_reviews.text: The adaptor in the image on griffin website, on amazon, apple..etc. it's different that the one's i got. I think that i got the "cheap version" or imitation, because the adaptors are not so strong and well build. The cable between connectors it's not rigid and strong.....it's just a thin piece of cable that will not last for long.
customer_reviews.author: Three Pillar Global Romania

customer_reviews.title: Works great with TV
customer_reviews.text: This product works great with my MacBook Pro and my LED TV. Would recommend it for netflix or other video watching
customer_reviews.author: Charlie MacEwan

customer_reviews.title: My first Griffin was very very good as this picture shows
customer_reviews.text: Fake griffin. My first Griffin was very very good as this picture shows. But recieved totally fake s***. Not original
customer_reviews.author: Ulziibayar Nergui

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted (8 months)
customer_reviews.text: This is the second converter I've had to replace. While it functioned well during the 8 months I don't know whether it's really worth it to keep paying this much money each time. It seems like there are only bad to worse options in this scenario.
customer_reviews.author: jhl

customer_reviews.title: Great adapter
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this adapter with two mid-2010 macbook pros for about a year and a half. The video and audio output works flawlessly with both our Samsung LCD TV and HP LCD monitor. My only complaint is that I lost it during a move and now need to order another! :)
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: No longevity
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for a while then shorted out and I have to buy a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: ixora

customer_reviews.title: works fine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this adapter for a 2010 13" macbook pro. It works fine and transmits both, video and audio. I do not know why, but at first it did not transmit the audio signal and after a while, without making any changes, it started to transmit both signals. Overall, it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Chih Chen Ku

customer_reviews.title: Its great but no audio!
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews of many adapters and this one is suppose to transmit audio but after trying everything, I mean literally everything I was not able to transmit audio to my TV's speakers. Another thing, is that sometimes the connection is way to sensitive, a minor bump or touch and you loose the image. Other than that it is good!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco A. Layrisse

customer_reviews.title: 2 in 1 adapter.
customer_reviews.text: This worked with the DVI cable that came with my samsung syncmaster P2450 monitor. I recommend this over the apple vga to dvi adapter because this adapter can suit both dvi and hdmi cables. Great pricing too. I saw Griffin Products at an apple store so I'm pretty convinced that this is reliable technology.
customer_reviews.author: D. Su

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works perfectly with my 2010 MacBook Pro. I had tried buying one of the cheaper adapters that claimed to support audio, but it didn't work. The DVI adapter that is included is a nice bonus too!
customer_reviews.author: Harry C

customer_reviews.title: Lovable but pricey
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, the fact that it comes in 2 parts is really nice and the 2 parts served me very well. I like it but I think it is pricey I got for 30$, I think the good price for it will be 15$
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Essam

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: I can now watch movies on my HDTV (only reason I bought this). I totally recommend Plex for Mac OS as media center if you don't already have one. The media manager is great :)
customer_reviews.author: Samanta Aquino

customer_reviews.title: This is the one.
customer_reviews.text: Don't get the connector they sell you in the Apple Store. That died within three months. This guy is sturdy and much higher quality. I replaced my wife's old connector with it and she actually came into my office a day later to tell me what an improvement it was.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua W. Harrold

customer_reviews.title: Jiggling this cable doesn't work....
customer_reviews.text: Crap... I gave up on this product after I have to keep moving the cable around to get a good picture, and I never got a good picture.
customer_reviews.author: Wit Chitrapongse

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It performs the task well and I am happy with it. Good quality thus far and good imaging quality. Yup.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.text: while pricey, this dongle does exactly what it says it will do in a tight, clean, and flexible body. It delivers high quality display and sound with my 2010 Powerbook Pro. If you have a sic new mac, there is no reason not to throw down for the right converter for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan

customer_reviews.title: does what its suppose to do
customer_reviews.text: Using with my mid 2010 macbook pro for 2 weeks now. It works awesome and the price was great. i have my macbook hooked up to a 24 in 1080p asus monitor and it looks great. also looks great hooked up my 50" plasma.
customer_reviews.author: Jakec

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product
customer_reviews.text: I'm completely satisfied with this adapter, it works like a charm, carries video and audio with out any extra configuration and its really slim. It is not cheap, but neither is expensive, since you get the HDMI to DVI adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I love it..it works perfectly..sadly I didn't try the DVI video display so I don't know if good or not
customer_reviews.author: Hussam Kurdi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product.
customer_reviews.text: This cable adapter is awesome. I love that it matches my new macbook air and that it actually works well with the hdmi cable. and that it has another adapter included for dvi is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: skys15

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly with my Macbook Pro (released late April 2010). I use the HDMI converter and it does both video and sound.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, useful
customer_reviews.text: Seems very well-built. The dual functionality is exactly what I need between my television (HDMI) and Apple Cinema Display (DVI). Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Sandlin

product_meta.title: Griffin Technology GC17096 Mini DisplayPort to HDMI or DVI Video Display Converter (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description: The Griffin Technology Video Display Converter converts video output from your mini display port source to DVI or HDMI monitors, displays and projectors. Get digital video resolutions up to 1920 x 1200. Display your video on DVI- and HDMI-enabled high-resolution projectors and external displays.Griffin Technology Video Display Converter:Resolutions up to 1920 x 1200Converts video output to DVI or HDMI monitors, displays and projectorsMale mini display port to female HDMI connectorConverter Length: 4"
feature_bullets: GRIFFIN TECHNOLOGY GC17096 VIDEO DISPLAY CONVERTER
Note: This does NOT provide audio support for pre 2010 Macbook Pro mini display ports.
